divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking with my parents out of a restaurant on a summer night. A couple probably also from the restaurant were looking up. I saw a disc shaped saucer with a brightly lit room above the gray body part of the ship. With a closer look I saw a human looking man who seemed to be moving about with other aliens not human inside. There was no sound. After about 5 minutes, it made and S-shaped exit and just disappeared with no sound. I pinched myself and spoke to the others during all of this to make sure it was no hallucination.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Lynbrook
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Gray in color, lights underneath, Oval disc shaped, lighted room with occupants.
